name: ai-based-resume-maker
description: AI-based Resume Maker with separate client and server workspaces

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=server && npm run lint --workspace=client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=server && npm run lint:fix --workspace=client
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=server && npm install --workspace=client
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=server && npm run clean --workspace=client
